title: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for Large Language Models: A Survey

sections.description: Introduce the concept of Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and its significance in enhancing large language models (LLMs) for natural language processing tasks. Discuss the motivation behind integrating retrieval techniques with LLMs to improve accuracy, relevance, and informativeness in generated content.

subsections.description: Define and explain the concept of RAG and its role in enhancing LLMs.

sections.description: Provide a detailed overview of large language models and their capabilities in natural language processing. Discuss the limitations of LLMs, such as hallucinations and lack of access to external information, which RAG aims to address.
